title: Bijker
description:
W. E. Bijker, T. P. Hughes and T. J. Pinch. The Social Construction of Technological Systems.  The MIT Press,  Cambridge, Mass. 1st edition, 1987.

W. E. Bijker. Of Bicycles, Bakelites, and Bulbs; toward a theory of sociotechnical change. The MIT Press,  Cambridge, Mass. 1st edition, 1995.

W. E. Bijker and J. Law. Shaping Technology/ Building Society: studies in sociotechnical change. The MIT Press,  Cambridge, Mass. 1st edition, 1992.

W. E. Bijker, R. Bal and R. Hendriks. The Paradox of Scientific Authority: The Role of Scientific Advice in Democracies. The MIT Press,  Cambridge, Mass. 1st edition, 2009.
